name: Muaath bots
description: Useful PHP Telegram bots hosted in free Heroku

TestPaymentV2Bot_ProviderToken.description: Telegram payment provider token obtained via https://t.me/BotFather

TestPaymentV2Bot_LogsChatID.description: The username of public group/channel, Otherwise ID of private chat/group/channel.

DevUsername.description: The username of the creator or main editor of the bots, Without @ in the start

BotChannel.description: The username of Bot channel in Telegram, Don't add @ in the start

BotGroup.description: The username of Bot channel in Telegram, Don't add @ in the start
